title: vultor_ceo
author: vultor_ceo
content: Hello everyone,I'm incredibly excited to share something groundbreaking with all of you – the Vultor Mobile POS and Crypto NFC Card. As the CEO of Vultor, I can't wait to show you how this innovation will transform the crypto world.Imagine the convenience of using your smartphone as a seamless and secure Point-of-Sale terminal for crypto transactions. With our NFC-enabled Vultor card, tapping your mobile device will allow you to make purchases effortlessly.Our vision is to make cryptocurrencies an everyday payment method, accessible to businesses of all sizes without complexity or high costs.At Vultor, we prioritize security by storing private keys offline, providing maximum asset protection.Join us on this thrilling journey as we redefine the way we transact with cryptocurrencies. I'm here to answer any questions and engage with our amazing community.Thank you for being part of this exciting adventure!https://vultor.io/bitcointalk/tap2pay.pnghttps://vultor.io/bitcointalk/realcard.JPGExample use-case: https://vultor.io/bitcointalk/shop.mp4 I am making this thread to personally answer any questions about Vultor and it's technology.Best regards,Mohammed HasanCEO of Vultor

comments.author: robelneo
comments.created_time: July 23, 2023, 10:42:31 PMLast edit: July 23, 2023, 10:53:11 PM by robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: vultor_ceo on July 23, 2023, 05:38:15 PMExample use-case: https://vultor.io/bitcointalk/shop.mp4 I am making this thread to personally answer any questions about Vultor and it's technology.I'm quoting you so the images will show up, this looks good but your platform is not in the developmental stage anymore since you have a token pre-sale coming up you can create an announcement thread in the altcoin section if you're serious about promoting your platform here which I think is a must you should get a Copper AccountThe most important is the announcement you can hire Jaycee to create a stunning announcement for you.And when it comes to marketing campaigns here Royse777  is the best you can find here.I hope you're project is legit and good, since you posted it here the community is open to checking and scrutinizing your project so be transparent and open about your platform.

comments.author: Faisal2202
comments.body: Welcome abroad dear, i visited your website and I am amazed to see your work and how much you have achieved even though the token is not listed and the project is on the way but still, your website is getting around 120+k users monthly. I have this question, will the Vultor Card be available after the ICO? and what's the difference between these 2 factors? I didn't quite understand them. Like what's the difference between transaction limit and transaction limitation? Your project seems legit and I am already getting interested in it. But I will only observe your platform for now. And keep growing. And wait one more question? I as a shopkeeper, do I have to integrate your APIs or anything or install your setup (maybe an app) to accept payments from others using your NFC card? i think the answer is yes but let's hear it from you.

comments.author: AB de Royse777
comments.body: Quote from: vultor_ceo on July 23, 2023, 05:38:15 PMExample use-case: https://vultor.io/bitcointalk/shop.mp4 Hello team,Amazing to see the product is already in use. Feel free to contact me for any kind of bitcointalk marketing. I will give my best to use the best approach for you in the business.Quote from: robelneo on July 23, 2023, 10:42:31 PMAnd when it comes to marketing campaigns here Royse777  is the best you can find here.Thanks buddy for the mention or I would miss it to say a hello. Much appreciated.

comments.author: Yamane_Keto
comments.body: I did not find a mention of bitcoin or how the card works with you? Is it more like a central service where you send bitcoins to the service address like Binance PAY and then you can pay using it like a payment card or is it dedicated to the VULTOR currency.NFC is a non-contact technology and it is dangerous unless it is encrypted, and I did not mention any encryption mechanism or any details.I'm sorry to say that, but your site does not provide any benefit, and you are almost selling a currency that is completely different from Bitcoin.

comments.author: vultor_ceo
comments.body: Quote from: robelneo on July 23, 2023, 10:42:31 PMQuote from: vultor_ceo on July 23, 2023, 05:38:15 PMhttps://vultor.io/bitcointalk/tap2pay.pnghttps://vultor.io/bitcointalk/realcard.JPGExample use-case: https://vultor.io/bitcointalk/shop.mp4 I am making this thread to personally answer any questions about Vultor and it's technology.I'm quoting you so the images will show up, this looks good but your platform is not in the developmental stage anymore since you have a token pre-sale coming up you can create an announcement thread in the altcoin section if you're serious about promoting your platform here which I think is a must you should get a Copper AccountThe most important is the announcement you can hire Jaycee to create a stunning announcement for you.And when it comes to marketing campaigns here Royse777  is the best you can find here.I hope you're project is legit and good, since you posted it here the community is open to checking and scrutinizing your project so be transparent and open about your platform.Hello,Thank you for your suggestion, i am going to purchase the copper membership for any future posts that include images, i will be posting a lot more work as i progress with development. I will invite users to download the app and beta test it.

comments.author: vultor_ceo
comments.body: Quote from: Faisal2202 on July 24, 2023, 06:40:03 AMWelcome abroad dear, i visited your website and I am amazed to see your work and how much you have achieved even though the token is not listed and the project is on the way but still, your website is getting around 120+k users monthly. I have this question, will the Vultor Card be available after the ICO? and what's the difference between these 2 factors? I didn't quite understand them.https://talkimg.com/images/2023/07/24/CxY3l.png Like what's the difference between transaction limit and transaction limitation? Your project seems legit and I am already getting interested in it. But I will only observe your platform for now. And keep growing. And wait one more question? I as a shopkeeper, do I have to integrate your APIs or anything or install your setup (maybe an app) to accept payments from others using your NFC card? i think the answer is yes but let's hear it from you.HelloThank you for expressing your interest in our project! We're thrilled to hear that you're already getting intrigued by what i have builtAs a shopkeeper, you won't need to go through the hassle of integrating APIs. All you need to do is download the Vultor user-friendly app (wallet) on your NFC-enabled device, and you're all set to start accepting payments from customers using our NFC card. It's a straightforward and convenient process that allows you to seamlessly connect with our platform and enjoy the benefits of our innovative system.At Vultor, we are continuously improving our platform to meet our users' diverse needs. One exciting feature we're developing allows us to buy back cryptocurrency from our users and provide them with cash in the bank. We understand the importance of cash flow for businesses, and this feature offers them the flexibility they need.We also recognize that widespread adoption of cryptocurrencies will take time, and we're committed to supporting our community throughout this process. What makes us stand out is Vultor's full cryptocurrency license, facilitating seamless transactions between fiat and crypto. This ensures a smooth and secure experience, whether dealing with traditional currencies or cryptocurrencies.At Vultor, we prioritize user experience and compliance to create a platform that simplifies cryptocurrency adoption for businesses and individuals. Our dedication to innovation sets us apart in the dynamic world of crypto.Should you have any more questions or need further information, don't hesitate to ask. We're here to assist you throughout the journey.We hope to have you on board as part of the Vultor community soon!

comments.author: Faisal2202
comments.body: Quote from: vultor_ceo on July 24, 2023, 08:53:46 PMAt Vultor, we are continuously improving our platform to meet our users' diverse needs. One exciting feature we're developing allows us to buy back cryptocurrency from our users and provide them with cash in the bank. We understand the importance of cash flow for businesses, and this feature offers them the flexibility they need.So does it mean you are going to provide us p2p trading in which we can convert our crypto into fiat. Well that will be outstanding then. But i hope the rates will not be lesser than other market rates. And one more thing, what's the availability criteria for getting NFC card and can we get it in countries where crypto is banned or not legal? If yes then how can we get it.

comments.author: dkbit98
comments.body: Quote from: vultor_ceo on July 23, 2023, 05:38:15 PMI'm incredibly excited to share something groundbreaking with all of you – the Vultor Mobile POS and Crypto NFC Card. As the CEO of Vultor, I can't wait to show you how this innovation will transform the crypto world.Do we really need to have another ICO token pre-sale for this service?  I was opening Vultor website and I saw a big popup advertisement and presale for yet another shitcoin, so even if your company is legit I immediately get turned off after seeing this.Another thing I noticed is claim that Vultor Cards will have no limits nor restrictions, and I seriously doubt that, since we need to use Vultor website/app aka V-Dashboard for everything.Quote from: vultor_ceo on July 24, 2023, 08:53:46 PMWhat makes us stand out is Vultor's full cryptocurrency license, facilitating seamless transactions between fiat and crypto. This ensures a smooth and secure experience, whether dealing with traditional currencies or cryptocurrencies.Can you please show use this License?

comments.author: Yamane_Keto
comments.body: Quote from: vultor_ceo on July 24, 2023, 08:53:46 PMAs a shopkeeper, you won't need to go through the hassle of integrating APIs. All you need to do is download the Vultor user-friendly app (wallet) on your NFC-enabled device, and you're all set to start accepting payments from customers using our NFC card. It's a straightforward and convenient process that allows you to seamlessly connect with our platform and enjoy the benefits of our innovative system.So, as I said in the past, it is similar to binance PAY, and even binance did not think of establishing its own system, but rather its cards are accepted wherever Visa and MasterCard cards are accepted, while it can be loaded in bitcoins or some altcoins.Your service can only be loaded with one cryptocurrency, and your card must be purchased to complete the payments, so why would the store owner accept it as a method for settling payments, and the number of users will be very limited.THIS IS NOT ABOUT BITCOIN.

comments.author: vultor_ceo
comments.body: Quote from: dkbit98 on July 26, 2023, 01:01:14 PMQuote from: vultor_ceo on July 23, 2023, 05:38:15 PMI'm incredibly excited to share something groundbreaking with all of you – the Vultor Mobile POS and Crypto NFC Card. As the CEO of Vultor, I can't wait to show you how this innovation will transform the crypto world.Do we really need to have another ICO token pre-sale for this service?  I was opening Vultor website and I saw a big popup advertisement and presale for yet another shitcoin, so even if your company is legit I immediately get turned off after seeing this.Another thing I noticed is claim that Vultor Cards will have no limits nor restrictions, and I seriously doubt that, since we need to use Vultor website/app aka V-Dashboard for everything.Quote from: vultor_ceo on July 24, 2023, 08:53:46 PMWhat makes us stand out is Vultor's full cryptocurrency license, facilitating seamless transactions between fiat and crypto. This ensures a smooth and secure experience, whether dealing with traditional currencies or cryptocurrencies.Can you please show use this License?Hello,Thank you for pointing out your concerns. As a start-up, funds are required for marketing, getting into shops, and acquiring merchants. Hence, we're having the ICO. Please see the links below for our cryptocurrency license:https://vultor.io/Vypis.pdfhttps://rejstrik-firem.kurzy.cz/18018220/vultor-fintech-sro/https://or.justice.cz/ias/ui/vypis-sl-firma?subjektId=1194438The Vultor app is also available on the App Store: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/vultor-payments/id1642735246. Feel free to download it, and we will send you a card to test it out in case you still have any doubts
